name: A Tribute To Attack
description:
Steam VR Attack on Titan fan game experimentation. Shingeki No Kyojin Virtual reality. Trying to find the best ODM feel in Virtual Reality. Dreaming about some AOT in VR ever since seeing the first person cut scenes in the old 3rd person AOT game. Any feedback would be appreciated. Tell me how bad it sucks and why.

Just two maps and Training dummy spawns currently. Testing slow motion near enemy spawns. Flares work but no game play attached. Gas will run out and blades break. Gas gauge works and visible blades in holster shows how many you have left. Wood Towers replenish gas and blades.

Default Index controller mapping:

  • Grip + left hand behind head = grab menu.
  • Grip + hover over swords = grab swords.
  • Grip + hover over Flare gun = grab flare gun.
  • Trigger + holding Flare Gun = Fire Flare.
  • Trigger + holding sword = Fire hook.
  • Button A + Button A + While hooked to anything = Burst pull you towards it.
  • Button B + Hooked = Release hook.
  • Left Joystick + While hooked = gas push up/down left/right.
  • Left Joystick + Grounded = move/run.
  • Button B + Grounded = Jump.
  • Run against wall = climb wall.
  • Right Joystick = Turn.
  • Button B + Holding flare = change Flare color.
  • Button B + Button A + Holding sword = eject remaining blade.
